snippet: The town will not mark the anniversary of the massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary, which occurred on Dec. 14, 2012, with a public remembrance, and it has asked the news media to stay away.
abstract: Residents and officials of Newtown, Conn, have indicated that town will not mark anniversary of Dec 14, 2012, massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary School with any form of public remembrance; town is requesting privacy and has asked news media to stay away.
lead_paragraph: The town will not mark the anniversary of the massacre at Sandy Hook Elementary, which occurred on Dec. 14, 2012, with a public remembrance, and it has asked the news media to stay away.

headline.main: As a School Shooting’s First Anniversary Nears, Newtown Asks for Privacy
headline.print_headline: As a School Shooting’s First Anniversary Nears, Newtown Asks for Privacy
